Metadata.Title: CVE-2022-32149 affecting package application-gateway-kubernetes-ingress for versions less than 1.4.0-22
Metadata.Description: CVE-2022-32149 affecting package application-gateway-kubernetes-ingress for versions less than 1.4.0-22. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package application-gateway-kubernetes-ingress is earlier than 1.4.0-22, affected by CVE-2022-32149
